com.hps.wizard
Class TaskFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      com.hps.wizard.TaskFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class TaskFragment
extends Fragment

This Fragment manages a single background task and retains itself across configuration changes.

Method Detail

onAttach

public void onAttach(Activity activity)
Hold a reference to the parent Activity so we can report the task's current progress and results. The Android framework will pass us a reference to the newly created Activity after each configuration change.

Overrides:
onAttach in class Fragment

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
This method will only be called once when the retained Fragment is first created.

Overrides:
onCreate in class Fragment

onDetach

public void onDetach()
Set the callback to null so we don't accidentally leak the Activity instance.
